title: The Most Favorite Champion of All Time [Voting Elimination] - THE FINALS, Jhin vs Azir
body:
**UPDATE:**
First of all, last group Winner is: **Thresh** (535 votes). KnifeCat was exhausted after last battle and didn't put too much interest in the fight, so the **3rd** place goes to **THRESH** and the **4th** place go to **RENGAR**. Congratulations to every fan, that was cheering for those champions. Have in mind, that they defeated 133 champions!:) Lets go to the last round of this whole tournament, to the FINALS, where we have our two finalist that made it this far: Jhin vs Azir! **LET THE BEST WIN**.

**TRAILER FOR THE BATTLE**
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcB9U--SzT4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcB9U--SzT4)

Also please check out my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA) and my [Twitch Channel](https://www.twitch.tv/razyelxgaming) and if you somehow like my content, leave a subcribe/follow, it will make me happy!:)

Thanks for every support!:)

**BASIC INFO:**

Hello,

who is your favorite champion? And who is the most favorite champion of all 137 champions? Let's find out! I've created a bracked of all champions currently in the game. It will be up to you guys to decide who is the BEST champion. 

The **voting will last for 2 days**, then **1 champion with the most votes will make it to next round** and I will create another voting thread for next Group and so on, until there is only 1 winner.

The full Bracked can be found on my [FaceBook](https://www.facebook.com/RazyeLx) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RazyeLxGaming) or down below on the next link:

[https://imgur.com/n0Lm7EQ](https://imgur.com/n0Lm7EQ)

So lets get to it. Here are the 2 champions, that made it to Semifinals. Vote for your most favorite. Only 1 will make it to next round!:) You don't have your favorite here? Then vote for the one you like the most:)

If you have any questions, just ask:)

PS: Only votes on this thread count. I won't count any comments/votes on other pages, forums, etc.
PSS: You can find results of Round 1, the results of Round 2 and the results of Quarterfinals at the end of article, in the last following groups
- Group P [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/BEEpWt0A-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-p)
- Round 2, Group IV. [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/iEE7vQu9-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-round-2-group-iv)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Ahri vs Azir](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/sp8ZOq6E-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-ahri-vs-azir)
- SEMIFINALS, [Rengar vs Jhin](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/TodoJty7-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-semifinals-rengar-vs-jhin)
- SEMIFINALS, [Thresh vs Azir](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/6VL4mpmT-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-semifinals-thresh-vs-azir)
- FIGHT FOR 3rd PLACE, [Rengar vs Thresh](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/72j78KeL-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-fight-for-3rd-place-rengar-vs-thresh)

RazyeLx

replies.body:
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/QN8t0T_wOso/maxresdefault.jpg
"Loyalty Will be Rewarded, With a coupon for 50% off your next meal"
Shurima-fil-A?
Shurima Fried Chicken

MY DECREE IS MADE.

SHURIMA WILL ONCE AGAIN STRETCH TO THE HORIZON
{{champion:202}} "4!" VS "SHURIMA!" {{champion:268}}

tfw memes actually make a difference in this voting poll T__T

edit: i dont understand why im being downvoted im crying tears of joy for the memes D:
tbh they already ruined the meme when they got him out of top 4.... he can't be 1st or 2nd cus number 4 is perfection.... he should have taken the 4th spot just for that

Apologies for spamming your post, but you clearly does not understand how true PERFECTION is achieved.
First round: group stage. Jhin defeats seven opponnents. Seven is a bad number. Far from PERFECTION.
Second round: group stage again. Six champions are defeated here. Six plus seven equals thirteen. Imperfect.
After that: knockout stage. Jhin defeats two more opponnents. Thirteen plus two equals fifteen. Not perfect.
He beats Azir, he will have SIXTEEN kills. SiXTEEN is FOUR times FOUR. A true PERFECTION.
jhin is illuminati confirmed.
It's not THREE, it's FOUR!
FOUR LOTS OF ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED - PERFECTION

> [{quoted}](name=Azteryz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=yAFBcHyk,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-30T21:43:28.780+0000)
>
> tfw memes actually make a difference in this voting poll T__T

Memes always matter, in everything.

There's only one winner here today...

https://i.imgflip.com/xarwt.jpg
I can't see the image.
You may not see the image, but you can sure as smell what the Rock is cooking.
Somehow this is funnier than the OC
You fools ruined it the moment you voted for Jhin more than 4 times. Azir wins.
We're trying to take him to 4444 obviously, true perfection.

I was kinda torn with this one, but Jhin's voiceover, game sounds, and the way his playstyle matches his lore is almost perfect.

I don't even play him, and he is probably the most well crafted champion Riot has ever made. If I can't have Kled, Jhin deserves the win.

I must say, to see Azir and Jhin make it to the finals is pretty believable. I would've found it weird if other champions somehow got to the finals, but Azir and Jhin have all the right to be the 2 best champions ever designed by Riot. 
Almost all Lol champions are unique and very fun to play, but these two guys really deserve to stand out in their own category.
Thresh deserves to stay among those two, as a very close third place. 

Now, may the best one win!

The fact that sandbox chicken is almost keeping up with jhin is almost mind blowing. 

But I think jhin will sit on the board's throne in the end.

Edit: as of 8:10pm that chicken is cooked.

Everyone's got votes to 4, but Shurima will be victorious! {{champion:268}} 

{{champion:163}}
SHURIMA

WoW almost 100 upvotes and 1 000 votes in the first 13 hours. This is so far the record!:) I am happy, the finals deserved it.

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Glad to see that this worked out so well. It got a bit shaky around group C, but, it all worked out in the end.

I know you only used these boards, but maybe try this out on Reddit? You may end up getting a different outcome.
{{champion:202}}  Fast food will never beat art
still baffled that kled isnt here :((
Crazy city-folk don't know the true value of nuthin' anymore!
Jhin es numero quatro
Sesame Street taught me just enough Spanish to understand that {{sticker:poppy-wink}}

I don't care for either champ so I voted for Jhin just because this video.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BrP0H-n0x3Q&t=2s
I accidentally upvoted and messed up perfection! Someone fix it please!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MSQ8Lledz3g
So like... I want that skin now...
I've always thought Jhin was the best designed ADC... But that... That was pure perfection
What have I done... I voted for jhin and I MADE IT 445.... WHAT HAVE I DONE?!?!
Brought him one step closer to true perfection, 4444
ooh, two of my favorite championsssss idkkkkk
JHIN CENA
Azir is thicc and has a sexy voice what else do you need?

Jhin is the most unique champion in the ADC class, and has always been fun for me. 

"*This stage is beneath my talent, but I shall elevate it.*"
one...two...three...FOUR
It's funny how the two favorite champs of the community are the ADC who broke the meta and made botlane look like a joke early this year, and the most nerfed champ of the game

Once more, last time
Foul gore, warm sand
Dead bird, torn wing
WELL DONE - JHIN WINS

Only mere hour late,
Jhin gets hype fast,
Azir lost this game.
This part make four

https://img00.deviantart.net/2f4e/i/2016/038/f/7/jhin_meme_by_mikouchan-d9qyb6a.png


Besides, I don't like sand. It's coarse and rough and irritating and it gets everywhere.
Kind of like you.

Oh look, Jhin is at 4444 votes, how perfect, but it's too bad you can't vote for him anymore. Oh well, I guess you have to vote for Azir to see how the votes add up :^)

_This message was sponsored by Shuriman Holdings Inc. _
Ya jhin is the most interesting champ.

Jhin's already lost;

He didn't come in fourth place.
